query.formula: A[] forall (i : drone_id_t) forall (j : drone_id_t) (i != j && not Drone(i).Init && not Drone(j).Init) imply not (Drone(i).pos.x == Drone(j).pos.x && Drone(i).pos.y == Drone(j).pos.y)
query.comment: Drones cannot occupy the same cell at the same time

query.formula: A[] forall (i : survivor_id_t) forall (j : survivor_id_t) (i != j && not Survivor(i).Init && not Survivor(j).Init) imply not (Survivor(i).pos.x == Survivor(j).pos.x && Survivor(i).pos.y == Survivor(j).pos.y)
query.comment: Survivors cannot occupy the same cell at the same time

query.formula: A[] forall (i : first_resp_id_t) forall (j : first_resp_id_t) (i != j && not FirstResponder(i).Init && not FirstResponder(j).Init) imply not (FirstResponder(i).pos.x == FirstResponder(j).pos.x && FirstResponder(i).pos.y == FirstResponder(j).pos.y)

A[] forall (i : survivor_id_t) forall (j : first_resp_id_t) (not Survivor(i).Init && not Survivor(i).Safe && not Survivor(i).Dead && not FirstResponder(j).Init) imply not (Survivor(i).pos.x == FirstResponder(j).pos.x && Survivor(i).pos.y == FirstResponder(j).pos.y)
query.comment: Survivors and first responders cannot occupy the same cell at the same time
All Survivors either reach safety or die, but they cannot get stuck in any in-between state
